name: gerbera
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a garden plant, often grown in a greenhouse (= a building made of glass, used for growing plants), with large, brightly coloured yellow, pink, or orange flowers : gerbera daisy Gerbera daisies are still popular, and right now we have greenhouses full of them. Gerbera is one of the important cut flower crops. Among the most pollutant-absorbing plants are ferns, spider plants, and gerberas.
a flower from the gerbera plant: The restaurant had a single gerbera on every table. The table was decorated with red gerberas. Handle with extra care, as gerbera petals are easily damaged.
